data.title: PolyAmines - Amino Acid Chelated Micronutrients
data.meta_description: PolyAmines are amino acid chelated micronutrients designed to prevent or correct trace element deficiencies at all stages of plant growth. Explore here.
data.text:
POLYAMINE BORON

PolyAmine Boron is designed to prevent or correct boron deficiencies that occur when plants are small and that can limit crop growth and yields. Readily available and rapidly absorbed by the plant, PolyAmine Boron is water soluble and non-toxic to plants when applied as directed. PolyAmine Boron is designed for foliar, row or broadcast applications and can be included in a regular spray program on crops.

POLYAMINE CALCIUM

PolyAmine Calcium is designed to prevent or correct calcium deficiencies that occur when plants are small and that can limit crop growth and yields. Readily available and rapidly absorbed by the plant, PolyAmine Calcium is water soluble and non-toxic to plants when applied as directed. PolyAmine Calcium is designed for foliar, row or broadcast applications and can be included in a regular spray program on crops.

POLYAMINE COPPER

PolyAmine Copper is designed to prevent or correct copper deficiencies that occur when plants are small and that can limit crop growth and yields. Readily available and rapidly absorbed by the plant, PolyAmine Copper is water soluble and non-toxic to plants when applied as directed. PolyAmine Copper is designed for foliar, row or broadcast applications and can be included in a regular spray program on crops.

POLYAMINE IRON

PolyAmine™ Iron is designed to prevent or correct iron deficiencies that occur when plants are small and that can limit crop growth and yields. Readily available and rapidly absorbed by the plant, PolyAmine Iron is water soluble and non-toxic to plants when applied as directed. PolyAmine Iron is designed for foliar, row or broadcast applications and can be included in a regular spray program on crops.

POLYAMINE MAGNESIUM

PolyAmine Magnesium is designed to prevent or correct magnesium deficiencies that occur when plants are small and that can limit crop growth and yields. Readily available and rapidly absorbed by the plant, PolyAmine Magnesium is water soluble and non-toxic to plants when applied as directed. PolyAmine Magnesium is designed for foliar, row or broadcast applications and can be included in a regular spray program on crops.

POLYAMINE MICRO-PAK

PolyAmine™ Micro-Pak is designed to prevent or correct trace element deficiencies that occur when plants are small and that can limit crop growth and yields. Readily available and rapidly absorbed by the plant, PolyAmine Micro-Pak is water soluble and non-toxic to plants when applied as directed. PolyAmine Micro-Pak is designed for foliar, row or broadcast applications and can be included in a regular spray program on crops.

POLYAMINE ZINC

PolyAmine Zinc is designed to prevent or correct zinc deficiencies that occur when plants are small and that can limit crop growth and yields. It’s readily available, rapidly absorbed by the plant, is water soluble and non-toxic to plants when applied as directed. PolyAmine Zinc is designed for foliar, row or broadcast applications and can be included in a regular spray program on crops.
